Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Dermatology \Der`ma*tol"o*gy\, n. [Gr. de`rma, -atos, skin + -logy: cf. F. dermatologie.] The science which treats of the skin, its structure, functions, and diseases. [1913 Webster]
dermatology n : the branch of medicine dealing with the skin and its diseases
